body_content.explanation: a language that has been created for a particular purpose, rather than one that has developed naturally as a way for people to communicate:
examples: Esperanto is perhaps the best-known of all artificial languages.
Programming languages are artificial languages in which the syntax and semantics are strictly defined.
He categorized seven types of speech-form, which were standard language, classical language, artificial language, vernacular, dialect, creole and pidgin.
